description: A collection of XML rule processors.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

parameters.description: The XPath condition paths of the rules in the rule set.
parameters.name: rulePaths

parameters.description: The namespace mapping table. Can accept: Array of Arrays of 2 Strings. (Optional)
parameters.name: prefixMappingTable

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new XMLRuleProcessor (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the XMLRuleProcessor.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the XMLRuleProcessors within the specified range.

parameters.description: The XMLRuleProcessor, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLRuleProcessor, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The XMLRuleProcessor, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLRuleProcessor, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the XMLRuleProcessor that follows the desired XMLRuleProcessor.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor whose index follows the specified XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.

parameters.description: The XMLRuleProcessor whose index comes before the desired XMLRuleProcessor.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLRuleProcessor.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified index.

name: XMLRuleProcessors
